TextView.android:text: \t\tNote: These are short descriptions of rituals commonly known in-game. Additional rituals exist but you must discover them in game. Many rituals have additional powers beyond those listed in summary!
A ritual circle that preserves blood indefinitely.
Sends a 10-letter message to a target on an object.
Victim has only a 1 in 20 chance of remembering their next death.
Creates a cauldron that can be used to infuse wytch magic into food and communicate with their demonic patron.
Creates a magical mirror that gives cryptic but truthful answers about future events.
Grants a 3 in 4 chance of remembering your next death.
Creates a contract that can be forced upon a summoned demon.
Summons a spirit linked demonic familiar that helps with ritual casting and can sense individuals who’s blood its master possesses.
Creates a barrier around the circle, those who have given their blood to the circle can pass freely through it.
Creates a temporary duplicate of the circle inside a shed-sized grass hut, which grows chicken legs and can move to new locations.
Allows the casting of 1 battlemagic spell at a distant target for each litre of their blood used. If a truename is added, spells gain ritual prefix.
Augments a cauldron to be able to infuse any sphere of magic and also adds an echo effect vs race if blood from that race is added to the mixture.
Replaces Weakness spells with Debilitating Pus spells, which are more powerful.
Increases duration of wytch rituals by +3 months.
Uses the target’s blood to create a doll which can then be used as a target for wytch rituals. If a truename is added, any ritual sphere may be cast.
Curses the target to preform a 5-word command.
30 natural AP that can be refit by pouring blood onto the skin.
Grants the ability to cast Power Word Area: Magic Horror 1/min for 1 hour.
Enhances an existing Bloodhound Imp to gain Magic Requital and Magic Bind.
eplaces Blood Curse with Blood Thief, which absorbs blood from the target into the caster.
Augments a wytch circle to cause the uninvested to forget where it is.
Augments a cauldron to imbue battle magic spells into drinks and the ability to reset cauldron uses by adding blood to it.
The target of this ritual chooses a “passion” and gains powers based on it.
Inside this hat is a toad which absorbs alchemy like a sponge and can be thrown like a gas globe. Also grants Magic Hallucinate if licked.
Implants a second heart in the cast of the caster which can store blood to be used to gain temporary body points and save them from bleed counts.
Grants the ability to use your own blood to open mundane and magic locks, including Artisan Vaults if you know the owner’s truename.
Adds a magic parasite to an existing poppet doll which allows BM spells to be cast as Power Word Directed against the poppet’s effigy.
Adds 1 year to the duration of Wytchcraft rituals.
Grants 5 magic threshold, +2 str, +50 body but adds an obsession to have it recast.
Puts all targets within a building into a magical slumber by drawing a hex on an outside wall and whispering a rhyme.
Adds a demonic altar to a circle, creates an artifact that boosts Wytch magic and allows curses to be placed on mundane and magic items.
Final cauldron augment that adds a powerful hex to foodstuff against a specific target, compelling them to eat it.
Creates an hourglass from a victim’s blood which will kill them in 24 hours if not destroyed, but gives the victim its general location.
Turns the victim’s heart into a spider, which bursts from their chest and runs to the wytch’s circle where it then gives the wytch power over them.
Causes the target to age 1 racial bracket, and lowers the caster’s age by 1 bracket.
Turns 1/ever Wytchcraft ritual effects into 1/day effects.
The victim will take 2 deaths the next time they resurrect.
The area around the circle becomes foul, twisted, and corrupted - those approaching gain swampwalk, weakness, curse of pain and take magical body damage.
Instead of dying, the target will explode in a cloud of blood and reform in a circle they are invested in.
Summons a powerful creature which gains body the more blood you sacrifice and which turns BM spells cast into it into hourly abilities to hunt a target you provide.
Transforms the target into a powerful dragon-like creature.
Improves your demonic pact, giving yourself completely to your patron but also granting very powerful abilities.
Turns a Dark ritual circle into a hoop for easy transport.
